short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture details of prospects, find professional email addresses and verify emails, with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily find anyone’s email address to get in touch with the right person before your competition does.

Get the ProspectMint free extension and begin collecting correct email addresses from LinkedIn and webpages and start growing. Here’s the most reliable lead generation tool for growth marketers, sales teams, recruiters, HR professionals and anyone who’s trying to reach decision-makers.

Already have email addresses? In that case you can use the extension to check the validity of the email address. That way, you can avoid sending to invalid email addresses, prevent hard bounce and protect your sender reputation.

Learn more about people you’re trying to woo. ProspectMint lets you collect all the relevant information about the people you wish to reach out to. Use these insights to create more focused, more relevant campaigns and hugely improve your response rate.

You can use ProspectMint extension to build a powerful email list. Use this list to reach buyers and increase sales, hire people to build a great team, get in touch with influencers for better PR and drive growth for your business.

Build and run drip campaigns with the confidence that only comes from reliable, verified contact details. If you are a B2B marketer, growth hacker, startup founder, or a sales head, this plugin will save you tons of time and help you achieve better results faster.

- Discover: Instantly find verified email addresses. Spend time on connecting and converting, not on searching for emails.
- Verifier: Immediately validate email addresses. Prevent hard bounce, protect sender reputation and improver email marketing ROI.
- Prospector: Understand your prospects better. Collect more data about them and create focused messages that instantly connect.
